option.name: originalContent
option.value:
.Home // min-height: 2000px padding: 0 .text__container padding: 0 30px display: flex flex-direction: column justify-content: center align-items: flex-start h2, ul align-self: center @media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-small) p, ul margin-right: 5vw #Slideshow_container aspect-ratio: 16/9 width: 70% margin-bottom: 30px // max-width: 1080px padding: 0 30px position: relative
img width: 100%
@media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-small) width: 100% padding: 0 5px
.fullscreen-button position: absolute bottom: 50px right: 50px background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) color: white border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) border-radius: 15px width: 100px height: 40px display: flex align-items: center justify-content: center cursor: pointer font-size: 18px z-index: 10 transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
&:hover background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) transform: scale(1.1)
&:active transform: scale(0.95)
.title_container p font-size: calc(15px + 2.5vw) top: 25% @media screen and (max-width: $test) font-size: calc(15px + 5vw) h1 font-size: calc(15px + 5vw) top: 58% letter-spacing: 20px @media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-tablet-max) and (min-width: $layout-breakpoint-tablet-min) font-size: calc(15px + 3.4vw) letter-spacing: 13px @media screen and (max-width: $test) font-size: calc(15px + 11.7vw) letter-spacing: 13px
.Slideshow &_section display: flex justify-content: center width: 100%

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
.Home // min-height: 2000px padding: 0 .text__container padding: 0 30px display: flex flex-direction: column justify-content: center align-items: flex-start h2, ul align-self: center @media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-small) p, ul margin-right: 5vw #Slideshow_container aspect-ratio: 16/9 width: 70% margin-bottom: 30px // max-width: 1080px padding: 0 30px position: relative
img width: 100%
@media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-small) width: 100% padding: 0 5px
.fullscreen-button position: absolute bottom: 15px right: 15px background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) color: white border: none border-radius: 50% width: 50px height: 50px display: flex align-items: center justify-content: center cursor: pointer font-size: 20px z-index: 10 transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)
&:hover background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) transform: scale(1.1)
&:active transform: scale(0.95)
.title_container p font-size: calc(15px + 2.5vw) top: 25% @media screen and (max-width: $test) font-size: calc(15px + 5vw) h1 font-size: calc(15px + 5vw) top: 58% letter-spacing: 20px @media screen and (max-width: $layout-breakpoint-tablet-max) and (min-width: $layout-breakpoint-tablet-min) font-size: calc(15px + 3.4vw) letter-spacing: 13px @media screen and (max-width: $test) font-size: calc(15px + 11.7vw) letter-spacing: 13px
.Slideshow &_section display: flex justify-content: center width: 100%

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
